overall.title: Highly Polarized
overall.subtitle: Superfan enthusiasm (especially on Instagram) versus sharp Goodreads criticism; art broadly praised while writing/satire draws fire.

platformSentiments.title: Goodreads
platformSentiments.description: Split ratings with clusters at 5â˜… and 1â€“2â˜…. Positives cite empowerment, humor, and striking art; negatives call the writing amateurish and the satire too blunt.

platformSentiments.title: Instagram
platformSentiments.description: Strongly supportive, especially among Emilia Clarke fans; affectionate, celebratory tone with many heart emojis and praise for Clarkeâ€™s versatility.

platformSentiments.title: CannonballRead (review blog)
platformSentiments.description: Noted bifurcation: some women gave five stars for feminist energy, while another camp (including some male readers) pushed back against overt messaging, yielding 1â˜… takes.

platformSentiments.title: Fan forums / Hardcore comics sites
platformSentiments.description: A few champions in the 3â€“4â˜… camp acknowledging interesting points and concept; broader communities remain skeptical of execution.

closingText: Net takeaway: a love-it-or-hate-it title. Instagram superfans celebrate the feminist concept and Clarkeâ€™s involvement; Goodreads and some blog readers split hard, praising the art while critiquing writing and tonal execution.
